name: Kiddywidget
condition_immunities: blinded, deafened, exhaustion, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned

traits.Unusual Nature: The kiddywidget doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.

actions.Multiattack: The kiddywidget makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its tail.
actions.Bite: Melee Weapon Attack: +4+1d4 + 2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage. If the target is a creature, it is grappled by the kiddywidget (escape DC 8+1d4 + 6).
actions.Tail: Melee Weapon Attack: +4+1d4 + 2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage plus 2 (1d4) lightning damage.
